.. java:import:: picocli CommandLine.Command

.. java:import:: picocli CommandLine.Option

SampleCommand
=============

.. java:package:: life.qbic.cli
   :noindex:

.. java:type:: @Command public class SampleCommand extends AbstractCommand

   Abstraction of command-line arguments that will be passed to \ :java:ref:`SampleTool`\  at construction time.
